First get on the `CS.Stanford.EDU` network (use VPN if not physically there)
```
ssh ianhuang@sc.stanford.edu
```

To start interactive session
```
srun --partition=visionlab --pty bash
```
Change parition to `macondo` for GPU access.

To add a gpu:
```
srun --partition=visionlab --gres=gpu:1 --pty bash
```
To request a specific type of GPU:
```
srun --partition=mypartition --gres=gpu:titanx:1 --pty bash
```
To reqwuest a certain amount of VRAM:
```
srun --partition=mypartition --gres=gpu:1 --constraint=12G --pty bash
```
